page.loginCtaText: I have an account, I log in
page.signinCtaText: I don't have an account, Registration

auth_card.loginDescription: Choose to log in with your e-mail address, via github or google.
auth_card.signinDescription: Register with your e-mail address, via Github or Google.
auth_card.testimonialComment: "A revolutionary project management solution: powerful, intuitive and fully customizable. Simplify your project management today!"

profil.description: The profile you choose will represent you on TaskHub, and defines your profile photo. No pressure, if you wish to opt for another profile, you can do so at a later date.

agreeConditionText: By clicking continue, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

formError.title: Oh no something went wrong !
formError.default: The email address or password is incorrect, please try again.
formError.email: Your email address format is invalid !
formError.password: Your password must include at least 4 characters !
